channel.title: Research on Lorenzo Rimella
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Lorenzo Rimella

item.title: 1- Hidden Markov models
item.description: filtering, smoothing and inference when scaling up to high-dimensions

item.title: 2- Monte Carlo methods
item.description: Sequential Monte Carlo and the development of smart proposal distributions and resampling schemes

item.title: 3- Epidemiological modelling
item.description: compartmental models in epidemiology at both population and individuals level

item.title: 4- Deep Learning
item.description: training different architecture of neural networks (Bayesian or not) to solve complex tasks
